title: Twitter threatens legal action over Threads app
description: Its owner Elon Musk says "competition is fine, cheating is not" a day after the rival app launches.

title: Wimbledon 2023: Liam Broady fulfils childhood dream with Centre Court win
description: Briton Liam Broady fulfils a childhood dream with his emphatic second-round win over fourth seed Casper Ruud on Centre Court at Wimbledon.

title: Murray leads Tsitsipas as match stopped by curfew
description: Andy Murray dazzles under the Wimbledon lights again as he leads Greek fifth seed Stefanos Tsitsipas in a thriller on Centre Court.

title: Wimbledon 2023: Andy Murray recovers from slip to win third set against Stefanos Tsitsipas
description: Watch the moment Andy Murray recovers from a slip to win the third set in his Wimbledon second round match against Stefanos Tsitsipas, before play was stopped for the day.

title: Iowa teen jailed for killing Spanish teacher over bad grade
description: The judge says the 2021 murder of the 66-year-old mother-of-three by two Iowa students was "evil".

title: OceanGate: Owner of Titan submersible suspends exploration
description: The firm posts a one-line statement saying it has stopped "all exploration and commercial operations".

title: Wimbledon 2023: Elena Rybakina beats injured Alize Cornet; Elina Svitolina, Mirra Andreeva also win
description: Defending Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina reaches the third round with a laboured victory over an injury-hampered Alize Cornet.

title: Wagner Group: Russian state media takes aim at Prigozhin
description: Piles of cash, weapons and a giant sledgehammer seen in pictures allegedly showing a raid on his home.

title: Wimbledon 2023: Lorenzo Musetti, Aslan Karatsev & GB's Katie Boulter star in shots of day four
description: Watch the best shots from day four of Wimbledon, including Lorenzo Musetti, Aslan Karatsev and British number one Katie Boulter.

title: Ashes: Jonny Bairstow makes point of waiting in his crease after controversial stumping at Lord's
description: Jonny Bairstow makes a point of waiting to leave his crease after a ball goes through to Alex Carey, clearly hoping to avoid a repeat of his controversial stumping at Lord's.

title: The Ashes: England v Australia - third Test, day one highlights
description: Mark Wood takes five wickets for England and Mitchell Marsh hits a century for Australia in an enthralling first day of the crucial third Ashes Test at Headingley.

title: Wimbledon 2023 Highlights: GB's Liam Broady beats Casper Ruud in five-set thriller
description: Watch as Britain's Liam Broady beats Norwegian fourth seed Casper Ruud in one of the biggest shocks at this year's Wimbledon with a remarkable five-set win on Centre Court.

title: Brad Pitt to 'race' during F1 British GP weekend at Silverstone
description: The Hollywood star is filming scenes at Silverstone for a new F1 movie co-produced by Lewis Hamilton.

title: Week of strikes to disrupt Tube services, RMT says
description: Week of strikes to hit Tube services from 23 July in row over pensions and job cuts, RMT union says.

title: The Ashes 2023: Mark Wood takes 5-34 but third Test poised after Mitchell Marsh ton
description: A rapid Mark Wood stars for England but Mitchell Marsh's ton means the third Ashes Test is in the balance after a gripping first day.

title: Lukashenko: No heroes after Wagner mutiny, Belarus leader tells BBC

title: UK to sanction Iran after credible threats from regime
description: The sanctions will send a "clear message to the regime", Foreign Secretary James Cleverly says.

title: Granit Xhaka: Bayer Leverkusen sign Swiss midfielder from Arsenal for £21.4m
description: Granit Xhaka leaves Arsenal to join German side Bayer Leverkusen in a deal worth 25m euros (£21.4m).

title: Stephen Lawrence case: 'Disgrace' retired detectives will not be charged, says mother

title: Ruth Perry: Ofsted chief defends inspection after head's death
description: Head teacher Ruth Perry took her own life while waiting for the publication of a critical report.

title: Uxbridge by-election: Keir Starmer won't say whether he backs ULEZ expansion
description: The Labour leader is reluctant take sides in by-election dispute over expanding London's clean-air zone.

title: The Ashes 2023: England's Mark Wood takes superb 5-34 against Australia

title: Government loses court battle over Boris Johnson's Covid WhatsApps

title: Kevin Spacey: Actor came out to 'disguise' behaviour, jury told

title: Wimbledon 2023 results: Liam Broady beats Casper Ruud, Katie Boulter through, Jan Choinski out

title: Tour de France: Tadej Pogacar beats Jonas Vingegaard to win stage six after thrilling finale

title: The Ashes 2023: England's Joe Root drops Alex Carey then catches Travis Head in consecutive balls
